text: aur har shakhsh ko jo kuchh bhee usane kiya tha usaka poora poora badala milega aur un par kisee tarah ka julm na kiya jaega khuda ne ek gaanv kee masal bayaan pharamaee jisake rahane vaale har tarah ke chain va itmenaan mein the har taraph se baapharaagat (bahut jyaada) unakee rozee unake paas aaee thee phir un logon ne khuda kee nooamaton kee naashukree kee to khuda ne unakee karatooton kee badaulat unako maza chakha diya
